title: lightlord
author: lightlord
content: From this timestamp is what crypto feels like atm.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XjYpZRUDLa4&t=237s

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: You feel nothing if you sell at the right times & buy during big dips. Noobs are panicking now but seasoned investors (like yourself, lightlord) see bear markets as opportunities to buy cheap crypto.

comments.author: lightlord
comments.body: Quote from: DeathAngel on May 09, 2022, 07:26:48 PMYou feel nothing if you sell at the right times & buy during big dips. Noobs are panicking now but seasoned investors (like yourself, lightlord) see bear markets as opportunities to buy cheap crypto.Yep, but Bitcoin did breach below $30,000. I wonder if one of the large whales will panic leading to a larger drop, before an eventual rise.

comments.author: lightlord
comments.body: Well there it goes, it hit $25,000

comments.author: Tenystr
comments.body: Do you think it's worth buying if it falls like this?

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: Tenystr on May 13, 2022, 10:59:50 AMDo you think it's worth buying if it falls like this? As long as you don't gamble or take big risk. Â  I actually would advice you to buy more when it's certain the price will keep going up, and such time will come when Bitcoin is pleased.

comments.author: woodsandhillsplc
comments.body: If I spoke to someone for the first time, there is no way I would recommend them to get into crypto anymore... unless they need to do so for whatever reason, due to what they buy/sell.I think for me once NFTs and all the scammers took over, things have gone way South.

comments.author: Mamun41
comments.body: If you sell at the right time and buy at the time of the big dip then you feel nothing. Nubs is now panicking but seasoned investors (like you, LightLord) see the beer market as an opportunity to buy cheap crypto
